SELECT MEDIA_COMMENT_NO ,MEDIA_COMMENT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(MEDIA_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, 'MM.DD. HH24:MI') AS MEDIA_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_NO , (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = MC.MEMBER_NO ) AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEDIA_COMMENT_LIKE MCL WHERE MCL.MEDIA_COMMENT_NO = MC.MEDIA_COMMENT_NO) AS MEDIA_COMMENT_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEDIA_COMMENT_LIKE MCL WHERE MCL.MEDIA_COMMENT_NO = MC.MEDIA_COMMENT_NO AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AS MEMBER_COMMENT_LIKE
FROM MEDIA_COMMENT MC WHERE MEDIA_NO = #{mediaNo} AND MEDIA_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND MEDIA_PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL
AND MEDIA_PARENT_COMMENT_NO = #{mediaParentCommentNo}
ORDER BY MC.MEDIA_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE DESC
